text: She's previously spoken about people telling her to'settle'for fat girl parts while starting out in the business. And Kate Winslet expanded on overcoming her battle with her body during an inspirational speech at WE Day UK celebrations at London's Wembley Arena on Wednesday. The hugely successful actress, 41, revealed that despite being'bullied at school'for her appearance, where she was regularly called'Blubber ', she never gave up on her dreams - ultimately allowing her to be cast in the iconic role of Rose in Titanic.
